mapper.insert: insert into tourlist(areacode, contentTypeid, title, firstimage, contentid, addr1) values(#{areaCode}, #{contentTypeId}, #{title}, #{firstimage}, #{contentid}, #{addr1})
mapper.select: select * from tourlist where contentTypeId = #{contentTypeId} and areacode = #{areaCode} order by title
select * from (select * from tourlist where areacode = #{areaCode} and title like '%'||#{q}||'%') where rownum <= 10
